gemBase.unit: Fruit, vegatables, flowers, berries, fish and handicrafts for sale.
Open Monday to Saturday 7 a.m. - 2 p.m.
During the summer, ferry service from the North Harbour at the end of Aleksanterinkatu and motorboat service from the shore of Hakaniemi Square.
The pedestrian bridge from Mustikkamaa to Korkeasaari is expected to be finished in 1972.
A maritime museum is being built on Hylkysaari Island adjoining Korkeasaari.
Motorboat service during the summer from the quay at the end of Laivurinkatu.
In the summer a varied schedule of outdoor events.
During the summer also a motor-boat service.
Armfelt and Ehrensvärd Museums and the Coast Defence Section of the Military Museum.
Ferry service from the Market Square.
During the summer also motor-boat service.
